Quote: There are several things that make The UPS Store exceptional.
First is it's a proven business model that's been working over 35 years.
Secondly, we have the power of the UPS brand, a world recognized, world class brand.
It is a brand that has a great deal of strength in the marketplace, a wonderful reputation,
so virtually the minute you open your doors you have visibility in the market place.
The strength of this brand and the shield we carry on our sign is one of the most recognizable brands in the world.
And I think that attracts a lot of people to the brand just because of that.
There are several key factors that really distinguished The UPS Store from other business or other franchises that someone can purchase
Um, the best part really is that you get to be that independent business owner,
which is what attracts people to franchising in the first place. However with The UPS Store
we offer a really comprehensive program and you also get the backing of all of our resources,
We joined the ups network after doing research around a lot of different brands and the UPS really had what
we were looking for with our priorities of having a better quality of life and work life balance is something
that we can do together as a family um, we knew we wanted a brand that was strong and reputable and
be proud of and be apart of and um, we wanted a small team um that we could work with, and of course we wanted a good return on our investment
and UPS really fit all the objectives that we were looking for and going into business for ourselves
The gap The UPS Store fills in the market place is that we are a full service one stop shop for small businesses customers.
Small business owners need help and support with their business which we clearly provide,
it doesn't matter if we're providing a real street address with a mailbox or providing printing services.
Another item that makes The UPS Store exceptional is that our owners work this business from their heart.
They're involved in their communities. We support the Toys for Tots literacy program with them on a
national basis and our stores individually support local community charities and events all over the country.
I feel that this franchise is so successful because of the UPS brand and what it tells our customers
and what type of service they are going to get with in the store the other part that makes our franchise
so successful are the people that own the franchises.  it's not a corporate it's that person's livelihood
it's their families, it's their passion and that comes through in how we treat our customers and then
the service that they get when they walk into our store
Our corporate philosophy is that you're not alone- and we believe that we need to support our
franchisees because when they're succesful, we're successful. You know we've been in this business for a long time,
30+ years, and we know a lot of things that a lot of franchisees doesn't. We want to share
that information, we want to give everybody an opportunity to be successful, and that's why we say
you're not alone because we're in there with you to try to make the best we can out of your store.
There are several things that I think makes The UPS Store so successful.
Probably first among them in my mind is one of the reasons I was drawn to this business in the first place,
and that's the brand identity, the UPS logo, the respect, uh that goes along with that. Uh, secondly,
is the great support that as an owner I get from the corporate headquarters, I get everything from
training to advertising and marketing, from purchasing, I just feel like every need I might have there
is someone to call or email if I need that support
The UPS Store model provides a lot of support and resources for our store owners,
our franchisees. In the marketing arena we do it in a number of ways, um #1 we have national advertising
we cover off from TV advertising to print, radio, certainly the digital space. Our number 1 goal is to drive customers into the stores everyday
Uh #2, we have co-ops, so we have cooperatives of our franchisees to do, I'll call it more community advertising,
And #3, we have great resources so our store owners can do their own
advertising on a local level. We have an online site where they can get um advertising materials
and even if we don't have it, we're happy to make a custom material as well, so really a lot of
resources all intended to drive customers into our stores.
The franchise opportunities is really what the franchise prospect wants it to be. The franchisee can come
into our network and own one store, or they can come into the network with the opportunity to own many stores.
New franchisees get a comprehensive level training when they join the network. Included in that training is,
web based trainings, or WBTs, experience in a store and then we also have a university in San Diego
and of course you know all of the operational experience that goes along with it.
The ideal candidate for a person that wants to enter The UPS Store franchise
as a small business owner is someone that loves working with people, and be able to follow a proven system.
We love owners with an entreprenuerial spirit and we want franchise prospects to come to our business
and want to be able to be in business for themselves, but no by themselves.
Making money is great in this business, but the actual feeling for when, you get for helping
a customer out is just very fulfilling. You know that you've helped someone succeed, passed on that
entreprenurial spirit to somebody, and uh, that's the greatest feeling in the world.
